name: Family Life.

description: You are all welcome to the Family Life Sabbath which will be held on Feb 13-20 2021. the main topics will revolve around the Christian home and marriage. the event starts daily from 5:30 pm at the church ground and runs until 7:00pm. you are all welcomed to attend the meeting. God bless you all
